ygData.subject: Re: Diamond Dust
ygData.msgSnippet: someone tried this one already and the little gnome for the sk quest around there... so those two ideas are out :( ... From: Joe D  To:
ygData.messageBody:
someone tried this one already and the little gnome for the sk quest around
there...
so those two ideas are out :(
----- Original Message -----
From: Joe D <joed@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 8:01 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Diamond Dust


> From: Joe D <joed@...>
>
> On Thu, Dec 09, 1999 at 01:36:23PM +0000, Linus Gustafsson wrote:
> > And someone PLEASE find diamond dust soon, i need to get my skill up bu
> > something cheaper than aqualungs :)
>
> This may have already been tried (I'm new to the list), but there is a
group
> of ogres in Lake Rathe that grind dufrenite for use in the shaman armor
> quests. They may grind diamond, too. Only way to find out would be to go
> there and check, but a diamond is Not Cheap.
>
> Joe D
>
>
